query:
SELECT p.phrase_text
                FROM phrases p
                WHERE p.active = true 
                AND p.id NOT IN (
                    SELECT uep.phrase_id 
                    FROM user_excluded_phrases uep
                    JOIN users u ON uep.user_id = u.id
                    WHERE u.slug = $1
                )
                ORDER BY p.id
                LIMIT 1 OFFSET $2
